Additional Alife Resources

A collection of places to look for more topics relevant to Artificial Life.

YouTube

  • Dave Ackley’s Artificial Life playlist
  • ALIFE 2020 Conference Presentations
  • ISAL Summer School 2021 Playlist

Free Books

  • Biological Bits - this is a very short free textbook; if you have Apple devices, you can get the iBook free, otherwise the PDF is linked on the page as well through ResearchGate.
  • Rise of the Self-Replicators - history of self-replicators through literature and science
  • Conway’s Game of Life: Mathematics and Construction

Other Books

  • Complexity by Melanie Mitchell

The homepage of Prof. Anya E. Vostinar. I teach computer science and research the evolution of symbiosis using digital evolution and agent-based modeling. I wrote the Symbulation platform.
